Case# AVMIDIControlChangeEvent.MessageType.hold2Pedal

An event type for holding notes.iOS 16.0+iPadOS 16.0+Mac Catalyst 16.0+macOS 13.0+tvOS 16.0+visionOS 1.0+

```
case hold2Pedal
```

## [See Also](/documentation/AVFAudio/AVMIDIControlChangeEvent/MessageType-swift.enum/hold2Pedal#see-also)

### [Event Types](/documentation/AVFAudio/AVMIDIControlChangeEvent/MessageType-swift.enum/hold2Pedal#Event-Types)
